name: Parahelp
long_description:
Parahelp is an AI support agent that automates support tickets end-to-end for leading software companies, including Perplexity, Framer, Replit, and HeyGen.

To do this, Parahelp learns how a company's top customer support agents resolve support tickets today and integrates deeply with their existing infrastructure, including systems like Zendesk, Stripe, Retool, Slack, and Linear.
one_liner: Automate complex support tickets end-to-end at scale
